name: Table Tennis (itch) (Neptub)
description:
This is the first game that I have programmed. It is a game of table tennis. I made it free so you guys can enjoy the content, but if you have any spare change, you can always donate it to me. Even just a dollar would help me a lot. If you think about it one dollar might not be a lot to you but to me it is a great help. I'm a 14 year old kid who could really enjoy some money. Thank you for downloading my game.

Instructions :

Left Padde : Up is "W" Down is "S"

Right Paddle : Up is "Arrow Key" Down is "Arrow Key Down"
